citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:20-12:50pm on
2/18/2021. The inspector honked her horn and called the number on file. A message was left and the inspector waited on
the premise for 30 minutes before departing.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:20-12:50pm on 
2/18/2021. The inspector honked her horn and called the number on file.  A message was left and the inspector waited on 
the premise for 30 minutes before departing. 
 
 
 
End Section
